sections.heading: Odometers; unlawful acts; exceptions
sections.text: It shall be unlawful for any person to:(1) Knowingly tamper with, adjust, alter, change, disconnect, or fail to connect an odometer of a motor vehicle, or cause any of the foregoing to occur, to reflect a mileage different than has actually been driven by such mo

sections.heading: 60-190 to 60-196 shall not apply to gross-rated motor vehicles of more than sixteen thousand pounds.
sections.text: 60-190 to 60-196 shall not apply to gross-rated motor vehicles of more than sixteen thousand pounds.
